description: Allows the user to control any living creature by producing green gel-like collars from their hands. Once placed on a victim's neck, the collar solidifies and forces them to obey all verbal commands from the user.

users.circumstances: Breed ate the fruit at an unknown time before the events of the Caesar Retrieval Arc

abilityReveals.description: User can control multiple powerful individuals simultaneously, including Devil Fruit users like Luffy and Law.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Breed places collars on both Luffy and Law and forces them to fight each other in his arena.

abilityReveals.description: The control requires the victim to hear and comprehend the user's verbal commands.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Breed issues commands to Luffy and Law to fight to the death.

abilityReveals.description: User can command victims to bring out their full potential and maximum strength.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Breed can enhance the abilities of controlled subjects by commanding them to be at their strongest.

weaknesses.weakness: Commands must be heard and comprehended
weaknesses.description: If the victim cannot hear the command (such as when wearing earplugs), the control does not take effect. This weakness was discovered and exploited by Trafalgar Law.
While the user can control the victim's body movements, they cannot control their thoughts, consciousness, or senses, allowing victims to plan escapes mentally.

weaknesses.weakness: Collar disappears if user is knocked out
weaknesses.description: If the devil fruit user loses consciousness, all collars shatter and disappear, freeing all controlled victims.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
weaknesses.description: User is affected by the standard Devil Fruit curse of being unable to swim.

strengths.description: Can control animals, humans, and even Devil Fruit users regardless of their strength.
User can maintain control over multiple victims at once.
User can place a collar on themselves and issue self-commands to bring out their own full potential.
